title: Teaching Methodology to Improve Elementary Mathematics Foundational Skills Using Mental Math Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service/in-service teachers to master effective application of mental math strategies (jumping and connecting via base-10 strategies) for improving elementary learners’ number sense

learning_goals: Learners can explain the theoretical foundations and application methods of mental math strategies (jump strategy and bridging-to-ten strategy).
Learners can develop and implement lesson plans to enhance elementary learners' number sense.
Learners can analyze actual lesson cases using implementation fidelity assessment tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
